sentences.en: But the footage very Korea, well, wave - off also affirmed.
sentences.cn: 但画面相当丽, 不好, 波客也肯定了.

sentences.en: First, click anywhere in the program monitor where your footage is.
sentences.cn: 所以,首先, 用吸管工具在程序监视器上面任何地方选择点击你认为是偏色的,原来是白色的部分.

sentences.en: It incorporates live footage with studio outtakes and band interviews.
sentences.cn: 它包括生活画面,录音棚片断和乐队采访.

sentences.en: old film footage of the moon landing
old footage from the First World War
sentences.cn: 第一次世界大战时期的旧影像

sentences.en: Television stations require broadcast - quality footage to air Humanity in Motion PSAs.
sentences.cn: 电视台需要[人道开动]公益广告之广播品质用的连续镜头.

sentences.en: The film also made use of newsreel footage and vox pop.
sentences.cn: 电影还利用了新闻片片段和街头采访的表现手法。

sentences.en: The footage looks like the bird flew into a wall in the sky.
sentences.cn: 那一段就象是鸟在空中撞上了一堵墙.

sentences.en: The footage then shows masked men off Stanczak's head.
sentences.cn: 接下来的画面是几个蒙面男子砍下施坦查克的头.

sentences.en: The full-length feature, as yet untitled, will include interviews plus footage of their live gigs.
sentences.cn: 这部尚未定名的正规长度影片将包括对他们的采访和他们现场表演的片段。

sentences.en: They had stock footage of lightning , tornados, and hurricanes.
sentences.cn: 他们存有关于闪电 、 龙卷风和飓风的电影胶片.

sentences.en: This is footage from the marina's closed - circuit camera on the night in question.
sentences.cn: 这个片段来自事发当晚船坞的 闭路 摄象.

sentences.en: To create a 3 D composite branch with the selected footage.
sentences.cn: 创建被选择的3D合成素材分支.

sentences.en: To create an Edit branch with the selected footage.
sentences.cn: 创建编辑分支与选择的素材.

sentences.en: Walt and I referred to a video cassette of the original footage to check continuity and lighting.
sentences.cn: 我和沃尔特参照着一盘原始电影胶片录像带来检查镜头的剪辑和灯光。

sentences.en: Warning. This footage is in use. Are you sure?
sentences.cn: 警告. 这素材在使用着. 你确定 吗 ?
